title: Luther Metke at 94
creator_credit: Steve Raymen, Jorge Preloran, Richard Hawkins and Ethnographic Film Program
brief_description: A portrait of Luther Metke who has lived in this Cascade Mountains of Oregon since 1907. Tells how he was a veteran of the Spanish American War, an early labor organiser, a poet, and a builder, and today serves as a vital and lucid example of the rural ethic in America.
